ctx: Morski most vs. zahodna digitalna modrina?
content:
SEAGATE 3,5 vgradni disk BarraCuda 2TB 3,5 SATA3 6GB/s 256MB 7200 obratov ST2000DM008​WD WD trdi disk 2TB 7200RPM 256MB 6GB/S BLUE WD20EZBX​
Za in proti? V praksi.
author: wildude

ctx: Morski most vs. zahodna digitalna modrina?
author: Marxon

ctx: Morski most vs. zahodna digitalna modrina?
content:
Uporabnik Marxon je napisal:
			
		
	
	
		
		
			namen uporabe?
		
		Klikni za razširitev
	
Prenosi torrentov, nekaj oblačnih storitev (aktivni sync program), sistemske profilne mape s slikami, videoposnetki, nekaj glasbe in dokumenti. Redna-večkratdnevna zrcalna sinhronizacija (torej podoben promet v obeh smereh) omenjenih profillnih map z zunanjim USB diskom. Slike in videoposnetki se sicer ne spreminjajo pogosto, konstanten promet povzročajo manjši fajli v mapah Prenosi in Namizje (FreeFileSync).

author: wildude

ctx: Morski most vs. zahodna digitalna modrina?
content:
Pri WD so barve takole:

WD Blue HDDs are mainly used for general purpose storage, they are great all-rounders, and an average user can’t go wrong with Blue.
WD Green is basically same as Blue, but it tends to have less cache or work at lower RPM's which can lower performance.
WD Blacks are for pure performance including gaming, media, and content creation. Also one of the most expensive HDDs. (note at some capacities these actually aren't any faster than blues)
WD Red is a NAS drive. It’s optimized for NAS systems.
WD Purple is for surveillance. Advised for 24/7 operation.
WD Gold, probably the most premium of all. Made for a multitude of Datacenter-specific applications.
Jaz sicer za vsakodnevno uporabo že nekaj časa ne kupujem več vrtečih se diskov.
author: erikson

ctx: Morski most vs. zahodna digitalna modrina?
content:
O barvah sem si že prebral.
NVMe SSD imam za sistem. Za shranjevanje ni OK. Je sicer mnogo hitrejši, a je recovery fajlov zahtevnejši.
